caption.p: Curves show how the pandemic initially evolved in west African countries (continuous lines) compared with European countries (dashed lines) and other African countries (dotted lines): from the first case diagnosed in the country (A); and from the fifth case diagnosed in the country (B). Graphs were generated with data downloaded from the COVID-19 data repository of the Johns Hopkins Center for Systems Science and Engineering on March 23, 2020. COVID-19=coronavirus disease 2019.
